title: Settings
description: Manage the basic configuration options of the plugin

display.title: Display Settings
display.description: Customize the appearance and display preferences of the plugin
display.currencyDesc: Set the default currency unit for balance and consumption display
display.defaultTabDesc: Set the default tab displayed when the plugin starts

refresh.title: Refresh Settings
refresh.description: Configure auto-refresh related settings, such as refresh interval and behavior at startup
refresh.refreshIntervalDesc: Set the time interval for auto-refresh (default 360 seconds, it is recommended not to set too small to avoid frequent requests)
refresh.refreshOnOpenDesc: Auto-refresh account data when opening the plugin popup
refresh.minRefreshIntervalDesc: Minimum time interval for auto-refresh to avoid frequent requests (manual refresh is not restricted)
refresh.shieldDescription: Configure how the extension uses a temporary window with cookies to automatically bypass website protection pages (for example Cloudflare 5s checks) and then fetch data.
refresh.shieldEnabledDesc: When disabled, the extension will not open a temporary window to bypass website protection pages.
refresh.shieldContextsTitle: Use protection bypass in these contexts
refresh.shieldContextsDesc: Choose where the temp-window protection bypass is allowed. Individual options are ignored when the main switch is disabled.
refresh.shieldPopupFirefoxNote: In Firefox popup, shielded data requests are always disabled to avoid closing the popup. This setting is still saved for other browsers.
refresh.shieldPermissionWarningDesc: Grant the Cookies/Web Request permissions so the temporary window bypass can attach authenticated cookies before sending requests.

sorting.title: Sorting Priority Settings
sorting.description: Define the sorting priority of accounts in the list to organize the display of accounts
sorting.pinnedDesc: Place pinned accounts at the top of the list in the order they were pinned
sorting.currentSiteDesc: Place the currently accessed site at the top of the list
sorting.healthDesc: Sort by site health status (Error > Warning > Unknown > Healthy)
sorting.checkInDesc: Place sites that need check-in at the front
sorting.customSortDesc: Sort according to the field (such as balance) selected by the user in the list view
sorting.customCheckInDesc: Place sites using custom check-in links at the front
sorting.customRedeemDesc: Place sites using custom redeem links at the front
sorting.matchedOpenTabsDesc: Place sites that match any open tab (by title or URL) at the front

dataBackup.title: Data & Backup
dataBackup.description: Manage backups, WebDAV sync, and import/export entry points.

importExport.title: Import & Export
importExport.description: Access the dedicated page for importing and exporting data.
importExport.info: The Import/Export page provides full access to data import, exporting to different formats, and backup management.

accountManagement.title: Account Management
accountManagement.description: Manage accounts, balances, API keys, and configure sorting priorities in the dedicated management console.

newApi.title: New API Integration Settings
newApi.description: Configure integration settings for connecting to New API compatible services
newApi.urlDesc: Set the base URL for New API integration
newApi.tokenDesc: Token for accessing New API admin functions
newApi.userIdDesc: User identification ID for New API

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: Grant the extra browser permissions required by optional features like cookie interception and the temporary window firewall bypass.
permissions.helper: Only enable the permissions you need for advanced flows such as the temporary window bypass. You can always revoke them later without affecting the rest of the extension.
permissions.statusCaption: Permission status is synced with the browser. Click refresh if you changed permissions outside this page.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Allows the extension to read cookies for connected accounts when you enable advanced request features like the temporary window bypass.

webRequest.title: Web Request
webRequest.description: Lets the extension monitor outgoing requests so it can inject authenticated headers when required by the temporary window bypass and similar features.

webRequestBlocking.title: Web Request Blocking
webRequestBlocking.description: Required to synchronously modify requests and attach cookies before they are sent, ensuring the temporary window bypass works reliably.

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.resetDesc: Reset all configurations to default values, this operation cannot be undone
danger.resetSuccess: All settings have been reset to default values

theme.toggle: Theme toggle, current {{currentMode}} mode, click to switch to {{nextMode}} mode

messages.resetSuccess: {{name}} has been reset to default settings
messages.resetConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to reset {{name}} to default settings? This operation cannot be undone.
